title: USA! USA! USA!
body:
[](http://img.pandawhale.com/82350-Ron-Swanson-American-Flag-gif-9FWc.gif)

https://socialcontrol.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/4th-of-july-meme-captain-america-punching-hitler.jpg
https://media.giphy.com/media/Ez01FtPZuFYVa/giphy.gif

Before July 4, 1776 there was nothing but darkness. But then a light was born, and the shadow was banished form this land. Today we celebrate the birth of freedom itself.
https://media.giphy.com/media/rbE4XIr6GS8F2/giphy.gif

Now, some of your communist scum may say "But Fish! There are other good nations too!", to which I have only this to say:
http://cdn.acidcow.com/pics/20130430/how_things_are_done_in_the_united_states_of_murica_33.jpg

And to those living in the ashes of the British Empire:
http://mrwgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/Cant-Touch-This-MC-Hammer-Dance-Gif.gif

And it is all thanks to the greatest human to ever live, George Washington!
http://d1vr6n66ssr06c.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/KingWashington.jpg

And finally, to Tencent, the Chinese overlord's that run Rito, I have this to say:
http://pa1.narvii.com/6084/36f28ee58d9e1513ba16f4075092d68c4a4d1418_hq.gif

replies.body:
Meanwhile, most people still don't care enough to learn the difference between ''USA'' and ''America''

http://66.media.tumblr.com/a9b086f7491680325499a09976c5b14b/tumblr_o3qtec0ey91r3h131o2_500.gif

*jk, love y'all. Happy 4th of July!*

Actually, while "The Americas" refers to a hemisphere,  and "North America" and "South America" refer to continents, "America" is a nickname for a nation. It is the same as shortening *The People's Republic of China* to *China*.

https://media.giphy.com/media/GODSCQebffJzW/giphy.gif

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/0e/0ec21642faa0561bcd5cba43332d691c8712ebe07e2bcd54de24dd181c386b5b.jpg http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/cd/cd2b4793950aee02cab6808d9592838c1f6da982a783eb71b0f4eadfe529a639.jpg http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/852/286/9ac.jpg 

Come on man, my holiday just started.
Don't ask me to use my brain right now :c

Basically:
The Americas = Western Hemisphere
South America = Continent within The Americas
North America = Continent within The Americas
America = The land of the free and the home of the brave within North America
But how else will strangers on the internet get to feel mentally superior if they can't use logical fallacies?
http://img.memecdn.com/canada_c_3037767.jpg

Wow, it's still snowing up there? I'm kind of glad I don't live there now.

Explains why you worship the sun so much!
lol, no snow anymore, just rain {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
And Maple Syrup

i will get it in 10 days

google is your friend. i will make it faster https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bastille_Day

And in 10 days I will be jealous of you. But today, you are jealous of me!

Also, what holiday? I googled it and found either Bastille Day or National Nude Day. (I feel like it's the first one, but the second might get some attention, as well.)

If you're not on a waiting list.
look at it this way, I'm on it for free, and don't have to sell a kidney to pay for a lung
Yes that is nice, as long as your condition doesn't get worse while waiting.
no one celebrated canada day on here.
Well, that's Canada's problem. They need to encourage more patriotism in their people.
nice, lets encourage germans to be more patri.... nevermind
That's actually a pretty big problem in Germany right now - they're so scared to show anything even resembling patriotism because of the whole Hitler fiasco.

in brazil we dont have a lot of patriotism also, hell, half of the people i meet just wanna leave brazil and live in usa or europe

idk seems to me that if people on germany start to be way too patriot they could be mistaken by nazist and be perma-banned off the server...i mean country.

Yeah, that's why they've been hard-wired to NOT be proud of their country... kind of sad, since Germany has a lot of good qualities. They shouldn't be overshadowed by one (albeit major) problem in their past.
